## vue-resize-next

> A json viewer component based on Vue 3.x.

### Introduction

-   A json viewer component based on Vue 3.x.

### Install

```
npm install vue-resize-next --save
```

### Usage

```
// 入口文件main.ts(js)
import VueResize from 'vue-resize-next';

app.use(VueResize);


// 或者 *.vue文件

import VueResize from 'vue-resize-next';

components:{
    VueResize
}

// 使用 *.vue文件
 <vue-resize @notify="handleResize"></vue-resize>
```

### Change logs

-   Publish v1.0.0 2021/7/21
